## C7081 Statistical analysis for data science

![](img/C7081-slide.png){fig-alt="C7081 title slide" fig-align="center" width="400"}

Welcome to C7081. This module is a survey of machine learning and statistical methods including supervised and unsupervised classification, regression, and tree-based methods. There is an emphasis on practical applications using a series of **data stories** and **lab exercises**, along with **lectures** on selected topics and **readings**. A prerequisite is a basic working knowledge of R programming and introductory statistics.

<br>
